attributes.action: Allow Stinson-Hunter to be a governing body and catch criminals to allow free time for police.
attributes.additional_details: Stinson Hunter www.stinson-hunter.com showed the Nation on October 1st 2014 on channel 4 that him and his team set out to catch predators that allow themselves to groom and send indecent images to underage girls and boys. These individuals Live on our streets and need to be court before a crime can be took place. I would like you to sign this petition if you believe that Stinson and his team are to be given a room in a governing body building such as a police station, overlooked and controlled by police to allow them to gather evidence and make arrests.

rejection.details: This is a police operational matter
